Subject: Alliance Downhill at Battle
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

(A blade missile is basically the blade of Demon Wulf's sword shooting off 
and then becoming a missile, and yes, that particular orb had the effect of 
an EMP blast)

Oblitertron/Defensor/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Vehement/Sun Crusher/
Reflector/Chaos/Minion/Chordate/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot:




Oblitertron gave Defensor a final punch, knocking him to the ground.  He 
pulled his sword out of subspace and raised his arm aloft, and stabbed it 
into the side of the CF's hull, pushing on it with all his might, struggling 
to get it in foot by foot.  When he was certain it wouldn't brake, he jumped 
up as high as he could, reaching onto a part of the Cybertronian Fire, using 
the hilt of the sword as a foot hold.

He reached into the bridge of the Cybertronian Fire, the hole in it big 
enough to fit his fist and then some.  He felt something, and pulled his hand 
out, in his fist was Chordate, dangling by a foot.  Oblitertron opened his 
mouth wide, dropping Chordate inside without a noise, a crack catching his 
attention and suddenly it felt like there was nothing under his feet as he 
fell towards the ground fast.

---

Defensor tried to get up, mech-fluid leaking from his nose, but he fell back 
down.

---

Demon Wulf fired off a wide optic blast to intercept some of the ninja stars, 
the rest knocking him back a foot with a vicious growl.

"Infidels!" he roared, raising his sword and firing off another blade missile 
at Lilly.  He raised his left open palm, two bolts of laser energy erupting 
from the middle of it out ?4.

---

Dark Claw sidestepped the cone of acid and several blasts, but a few of the 
lancers struck him, nearly toppling him over, leaving a dent in his armor.  
He raised his left palm, forming an explosive orb of energy in hand, throwing 
it at Koj.

---

Flesh Ripper fell to his skidplate as twenty-five rapid fusion blasts hit him 
in the chest and abdomen, knocking him over in result.  He slowly stood up, 
firing three fire balls from his mouth at Koj, raising the rifle in hand and 
firing off three bolts at Inu.

---

Vehement ran as fast as he could, watching Oblitertron with confusion.  
Numerous blasts struck him, nearly knocking him over even with his heavy 
armor, but he kept running, boosters in his feet launching him off in the air 
towards the bridge of the CF.

---

Sun Crusher activated the jets in his engines, launching into the air at a 
fast velocity, heading for where his scanners told him Vehement was.

---

Reflector sped off into the air, following Sun Crusher.

---

Chaos kept on driving as all 15 fire balls struck him, leaving charred marks 
all over his form and liquifying some parts of the glass in his current mode.

He fired off another two energy-signature missiles at Liono Prime, these ones 
spreading apart and coming at him from the left and right.

---

Minion kept running after he fired, ten blasts of electricity striking him, 
knocking him back a few feet, slamming to the ground in pain.  He looked at 
where he had been hit.  The armor was nicely charred and not far off from 
breaching.  He got up, transforming into his modified jeep mode, driving 
forward at 60 MPH.

He activated the two weapons on the side of his form, firing 12 rapid blasts 
from one side at Dark Convoy, another 12 from the other cannon on the 
opposite side at the same target.

---

Scattershot fired off two optic blasts, intercepting one missile, the other 
striking him in his damaged chest, knocking him back in the air.  He regained 
a balance, firing off 25 armor-piercing rounds down at Grimmler.

---

Nemesis Enforcer watched Iron Raptor for a moment.  -I need an upgrade when I 
get home- he realized, comparing his relatively puny attacks to Iron Raptor's 
relatively strong attacks.

He reached into subspace, taking out a charge set to blow on impact, dropping 
it down towards Iron Raptor.  He raised his rifle after it dropped for a few 
seconds, firing down 25 rapid laser blasts at IR, making sure not to hit his 
charge with the blasts.
